backend/main.mo: Main actor managing prompts, blog posts, user profiles, favorites, newsletter, contact submissions, and access control with premium gating and admin-only mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and seeding initial prompt data, returning upgraded state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files, describing each component, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with lazy-loaded pages, root layout, theme provider, and global toaster.
Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time profile creation with name input and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Grid displaying all prompt categories as clickable cards linking to the filtered library.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines category metadata and provides a lookup function for category info.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a category icon using a sprite sheet, computing background offsets based on iconIndex.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: Button that copies text to the clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Displays status alerts for form states including loading, success, and error.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App wrapper that renders header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, branding, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, theme toggle, authentication actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Handles adding or removing a prompt from favorites with auth and premium checks.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Displays a summary card for a prompt with category, badges, copy access, and favorite toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Full prompt detail view with category info, access gating, copy functionality, and usage instructions.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: React UI component providing search, category, tier, and sort filters for prompts with active filter badges and clear functionality.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets page title and meta description on mount using React useEffect.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Theme context provider that manages light, dark, and system themes with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, reacting to identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Wrapper hook that returns the current user's profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for prompts, favorites, admin checks, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS styles defining light and dark theme variables, transitions, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Utility functions to build URL paths for blog posts and parse blog post IDs.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Functions to download single or multiple prompts as text files.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Filters prompt lists by search text, category, tier, and sort options using several prompt fields.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Builds SEO-friendly prompt URLs from titles and parses prompt IDs from route params.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides simple validation helpers for email, name, and message fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing PromptFarm AI’s mission, offerings, and value.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPromptsPage.tsx: Admin interface for adding new prompts with validation, auth checks, and tag parsing.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity auth and optional profile setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with previews and links to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a full blog post by ID with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Presents a grid of prompt categories with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation, submission handling, and status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing profile info, favorite prompts, and download options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, category grid, and feature highlights using shared UI components and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays free and premium membership plans with dynamic highlighting based on the user’s profile.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Renders a newsletter signup form with validation, submission handling, and status messaging.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single prompt’s details, handling loading and not-found states with navigation back to the library.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Loads all prompts, applies filters and search with debouncing, and renders a filterable prompt grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions for colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements to add, store, and display 20 new AI prompts across multiple categories with idempotent backend seeding.
